data.name: Cyber Warrior
data.detailed_description:
Story


You work as an investigator for the agency Cyber Bureau: a national organization in charge of solving cybercrimes. After an attack that stole millions of dollars from hundreds of accounts, you got called.

Your mission: infiltrate the criminal cyber organization know as Dark Omega and find where is the money. To help you accomplish this task, the Cyber Bureau set up a trap: they "fired you" and connect you with a known member of the criminal group.

So now everything is up to you. Work your way in and don't let this hackers to threaten the nation's security! But be careful, any mistake can destroy the whole investigation.

Gameplay


Explore the cyberspace and collect the evidence required to build your case. Breach the criminal's security and search for valuable information. Start your own table of passwords and execute brute force attacks to break in.

Disable their firewall and infest their computers. Steal their files. Do everything possible to stay one step ahead of the enemy.

Welcome to Cyber Warrior.

data.short_description: Cyber Warrior is a hacking simulator where your objective is to infiltrate and take down a criminal cyber group.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

movies.name: Break In and Search for Evidence
